entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Owned .ToJson() columns cannot .Ignore() complex properties requiring all properties be mapped as Owned types #35280
  • Allow parameterized types in queries using inheritance mapping (TPH, possibly even TPC/TPT) #35278
  • EF Core SQL Translation Uses Bitwise Operations Instead of CASE Statement for Boolean Comparisons #35277
  • Debug view threw Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.RuntimeNavigation' to type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.AnnotatableBase' #35276
  • EF Core 9.0 SQLite with Net Topology Suite on Docker/Linux silent crash #35275
  • Queries on primitive collections cannot be translated when using a compiled model #35273

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Handle first class spans #35279

Merged

  • Update instruction for daily builds to 10. #35274

Updated

  • Change ExecuteUpdate to accept non-expression lambda #35257
  • Adding support for multiple and named query filters #35104
    needs-design
